title: Smoother Gameplay
body: Anyone have any suggestion to make League run smoother? I don't run any programs in the background.

replies.body: Your PC might be going through some wear and tear like outdated drivers, which is normal.  Try out the steps in our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide.  The instructions there will offer some ways to tune things up and smooth out your game play.  I hope that helps!
